summary: A collection of general-purpose utilities for the ansible-test framework, including custom exception types, thread classes for managing subprocess I/O, display and logging helpers, environment and configuration helpers, file and path utilities, version and architecture handling, and assorted small helper functions.
business_intent: Enable reliable execution and reporting of ansible-test operations by abstracting common tasks such as subprocess management, output capture, error handling, environment preparation, and user-friendly terminal output.
